game.name: Airport Administrator Simulator
game.genres: Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Sports, Strategy
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Commentary available, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In Airport Administrator Simulator you have the chance to know the smallest details of how a big airport works.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In Airport Administrator Simulator you have the chance to know the smallest details of how a big airport works.

reviewHighlights.text: It sounded so fun! My life long dream of being an airport check in chick was about to finally become a reality...and then...it just...wasn't. Ok for a...
This game cured my depression, my anxiety, my gnorrhea, my aids, my failing marriage.
